page.title: 19Camping Site near Longdon
page.content:
The {Three Counties Caravan Park covers an{area of 6 and a half acres of open grassland. It has{25 touring {pitches}and adjoins a static Mobile Homes Park. There is a{childrens playground }and {good sanitary facilities}with{showers and a{laundry. The{site shop}sells{food}and{bottled {gas,} and {freezes ice-packs}on request. Prominent notices show a {First Aid box}and the{location of the {nearest doctor}and{telephone.
The site is{licensed by the local {authority}for touring vans and tents. Its close{proximity}to the attractive {walking country of the Malvern Hills and the {Three Counties Showground ensure its{popularity}and it is {necessary to book.
